statements: DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE source_type = 'Food Waste';
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'Organic Waste';
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_tracking WHERE source_type = 'Kitchen' OR location IS NULL;
DELETE FROM businesses WHERE business_id = 100 AND waste_weight > 500
DELETE FROM households WHERE waste_weight < 1000 AND house_id IN (1, 2, 3)
DELETE FROM households_waste WHERE id = 100 AND quantity_kg >= 50.5
DELETE FROM households_waste WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM households_waste WHERE location = 'City A' AND waste_type = 'Plastic';
DELETE FROM businesses WHERE name = 'ABC Co.';
